result.eng: I saw her while looking out the window.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amach
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amach
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amachI saw her while looking out the window.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus mé ag féaċaint an ḟuinneog amaċI saw her while looking out the window.

result.eng: I saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.orig: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.html: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromthaI saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an seanḟear boċt cromṫaI saw the poor old stooping man.

result.ga: Chonaic muid leac cuimhneacháin ar dhéanamh croise
result.orig: Chonaic muid leac cuimhneacháin ar dhéanamh croise
result.html: Chonaic muid leac cuimhneacháin ar dhéanamh croiseWe saw a cross-shaped memorial.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic muid leac cuiṁneaċáin ar ḋéanaṁ croiseWe saw a cross-shaped memorial.

result.eng: I saw the shopkeeper at the counter.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an siopadóir ag an chuntar
result.orig: Chonaic mé an siopadóir ag an chuntar
result.html: Chonaic mé an siopadóir ag an chuntarI saw the shopkeeper at the counter.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an siopadóir ag an ċuntarI saw the shopkeeper at the counter.

result.eng: I saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráide
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus í ag teacht chugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus í ag teaċt ċugam trasna na sráideI saw her coming towards me across the street.

result.html: Cá mhéad a chonaic túHow many did you see?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad a ċonaic túHow many did you see?

result.eng: She made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ga: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.orig: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.html: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí osna faoisiṁ nuair a ċonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.orig: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac Dara
result.html: Chonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do mhac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í anseo cúpla uair le do ṁac DaraI saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: I saw your announcement in the newspaper and I am interested in the position.
result.ga: Chonaic mé d'fhógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.orig: Chonaic mé d'fhógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.html: Chonaic mé d'fhógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw your announcement in the newspaper and I am interested in the position.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé d'ḟógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw your announcement in the newspaper and I am interested in the position.

result.eng: I saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
